metadata.title: CVE-2019-7609 kibana: Arbitrary code execution flaw in the Timelion visualizer (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: An arbitrary code execution flaw was found in the Timelion visualizer in Kibana versions before 5.6.15 and 6.6.1. This flaw allows an attacker with access to the Timelion application to send a request that attempts to execute javascript code. This could lead to an attacker executing arbitrary commands with permissions of the Kibana process on the host system.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
kibana is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
